text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: This is a coincidence. Out for an<n>evening stroll? I, too, am—
choice_data_list: You don't look like you're just out for a stroll.
You don't look like you're just out for a stroll.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's, well...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: N-no, never! I'm the miracle worker! I<n>would never...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah, ahem... Excuse me. I didn't mean<n>to raise my voice.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Sigh... How quick I am to lose mycomposure upon being exposed. I stillhave much to learn.

Smiling at her own consternation, Fuji<n>Kiseki takes a deep
breath and quietly<n>continues.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The tryouts are special.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
They're a momentous event where<n>runners who've risen
to racer status<n>take their first definitive steps toward<n>
entering the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Make no mistake, it's a far cry from<n>the scrimmage the
other day. At<n>tryouts, the expectations are as high<n>as the
level of each superb runner.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But me? I'm still not...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, from what you've seen, what<n>do you think of me?
Did I succeed in<n>my performance as a naturally<n>talented
and confident Fuji Kiseki?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Then I'm glad. I hope to always be<n>capable of that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But... the truth is, I still lack many<n>skills.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Today's incident is proof. If I'd been<n>keeping a proper eye
out, as I<n>should've been, that student never<n>would have
run away.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I... I know I should be resting, but<n>when I think about
tomorrow... I can't<n>fathom the thought of sleeping as if<n>
everything's fine.

Fuji Kiseki's fallen into deep anxiety,<n>making me realize
she'll continue to<n>strain herself so long as she can't<n>
shake this dread.

I don't know how to make her feel<n>better... What would be
the best way<n>to raise the spirits of an aspiring<n>entertainer?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So long as there are people hoping for<n>a miraculous race, it
is this<n>entertainer's mission to give them a<n>show to
remember.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Huh? What is it?
choice_data_list: I know what to do! Just stay here!
I know what to do! Just stay here!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What? Where—wait, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's you! That look in your eyes...<n>You found Fuji, didn't
ya?!
choice_data_list: Yeah, but I need your help.
Yeah, but I need your help.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? With what?
choice_data_list: We're going to make her feel better.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hmmm... All right, lemme hear the<n>plan.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain the situation to Hishi<n>Amazon, who graciously
answers my<n>call for assistance. That's when we<n>get to
work.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer! What could you be—huh?!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What is everyone doing here?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Nothin' special. This trainer here<n>asked us to come give you
a little<n>support for your tryout race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And these kiddos... Too curious for<n>their own good. I told
'em it's after<n>curfew, but they wouldn't have it.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
We heard you were doing<n>supersecret drills! So that's how<n>
you're so good! And you're always<n>coming to our rescue
too—just like a<n>hero!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
That's why tomorrow we're going to<n>be on the sidelines
cheering for your<n>victory, just like in those superhero<n>
shows!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And me too! Your races are alwaysthe funnest to watch! I can't waitto cheer you on!

text_block_list.name: Junior Students
text_block_list.text: Go, Fuji! You can do it! You're the<n>best, Fuji!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I don't know what to say...
choice_data_list: We all believe in your miracles.
We all believe in your miracles.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My miracles...
choice_data_list: Now it's time for you to believe in them too.
Now it's time for you to believe in them too.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hahaha... You really got me there,<n>Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I would never dream of letting down<n>all the younger kids.
And... I never will.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: So I'm going to smile, stand tall, and...<n>go home.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our efforts pay off, and Fuji Kiseki<n>finally decides to return
to her dorm<n>room and get some rest.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No sooner than I can blink, the next<n>morning arrives,
meaning it's time for<n>the tryouts at last.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're round the third corner!<n>Coming from far outside is...
the Black<n>Meteor, Fuji Kiseki! She makes up<n>for her slow
start in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Junior Students
text_block_list.text: Go for it, Fujiii!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(But! Look at this crowd! I'm in front<n>of a live audience! I
will always be<n>proud to be an entertainer—and I will<n>show
that to them, right here and<n>now!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki has the lead into the final<n>stretch! She's a
whopping eight<n>lengths ahead of second! What a<n>
whirlwind of a solo show!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(Forget the fatigue! Show them<n>you've got enough left to
smile!<n>That's what Fuji Kiseki would do!<n>Now, all that's
left is the big finish!)

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: This... is my MIRACLE!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Fuji Kiseki takes fiiirst! The<n>crowd is roaring with
applause for that<n>astounding performance!

text_block_list.name: Junior Runner C
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki... Thank you so much for<n>that amazing race. I
remember now...<n>my motivation—and my dream!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Phew... I'm completely exhausted.<n>You know, I'm a bit of a
stranger<n>when it comes to muscle soreness,<n>but this time
I'm afraid of what<n>tomorrow will bring.
choice_data_list: Good job out there. That was a real miracle.
Good job out there. That was a real miracle.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Heehee, that makes me happy!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It's the job of an entertainer to live<n>up to the audience's
expectations.<n>That's what I thought, at least...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But at the same time, I learned that<n>their expectations are
what give me<n>the greatest strength of all. I just<n>wanted to
say... thank you for teaching<n>me that.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Trainer, if you're willing... would you<n>continue to teach me?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
With you, I feel I can show everyone<n>a miracle even grander
than the one I<n>demonstrated today!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I instantly sign a contract with Fuji<n>Kiseki, the miraculous
entertainer who<n>brings joy to all!
